snippet: Andre Gomes, a Brooklyn resident, is looking for work after falling twice in 2014 while he was helping to install pipes with a residential building construction company.
abstract: Community Service Society of New York helps Andre Gomes of Brooklyn buy clothes and MetroCard so that he can attend vocational rehabilitation program and look for jobs; society is one of agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund.
lead_paragraph: Andre Gomes, a Brooklyn resident, is looking for work after falling twice in 2014 while he was helping to install pipes with a residential building construction company.

headline.print_headline: Searching for Work, With an Eviction Date Looming
headline.main: With Eviction Looming, an Injured Worker Accelerates His Job Search

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund

keywords.name: organizations
